modName: The Beautiful Barbarian - A Standalone Companion-CBBE-UNP
summary: One of the assignation targets of the Dark Brotherhood is the Beautiful Barbarian. She appears, gets killed, and is gone. Now the Beautiful Barbarian is waiting for the DB and not so easy to kill. In fact if you are playing the Dark Brotherhood quest line, and get the assignment to kill her, she will instead kill you!
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][center][img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/4545067-1446650431.jpg[/img][/center]


UNP version now available.[/color][/b]

[b]Special Information & Description[/b]

[color=yellow]One of the assination targets of the Dark Brotherhood is the Beautiful Barbarian. She appears, gets killed, and is gone. Now the Beautiful Barbarian is waiting for the DB and not so easy to kill. In fact if you are playing the Dark Brotherhood quest line, and get the assignment to kill her, she will instead kill you!

She is very overpowered and, as a barbarian, has the perks that go with being one. Ari can be recruited as a follower and can be married but, only if you destroy the Dark Brotherhood. If you recruit her and do the Dark Brotherhood quest line, you will break your game.

Let me reiterate, [b]IF YOU RECRUIT HER AND DO THE DARK BROTHERHOOD QUEST LINE, YOU WILL BREAK YOUR GAME[/b][/color]

[color=red]You have been warned.[/color]

She comes with her own heavy armor, enchanted battle axe, and enchanted bow, with the perks to make her deadly. She is over powered for the beginning of the game but had to be placed in Ivarstead because of the DB quest line. So I would request that you be, at least, level 10 before activating.


[b]Where to find her:[/b]

Just like the the DB quest, she resides in Ivarstead, standing guard outside the Inn or inside relaxing.

[b]Installation[/b]

[color=yellow][b]NMM strongly recommended.[/b][/color]

There are two versions regular and Nevernude, please choose just one.

This mod contains a number of loose files that need to be added to the meshes and texture folders. Missing one during manual installation will cause face and body problems.

[b]Manual Installation[/b]

Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to the Skyrim data
folder exactly as the archive shows. Be sure to enable the Ari the Beautiful Barbarian.esp

[b]How to Uninstall[/b]

If installed with NMM use NMM and simply uninstall.

If manually installed delete:
meshesAri the Beautiful Barbarian and
meshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomAri the Beautiful Barbarian.esp
texturesAri the Beautiful Barbarian and
texturescharacterfacegendatafacetintAri the Beautiful Barbarian.esp
Then delete the Ari the Beautiful Barbarian.esp in the data folder.
or
meshesAri the Beautiful Barbarian UNP and
meshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomAri the Beautiful Barbarian UNP.esp
texturesAri the Beautiful Barbarian UNP and
texturescharacterfacegendatafacetintAri the Beautiful Barbarian UNP.esp
Then delete the Ari the Beautiful Barbarian UNP.esp in the data folder.

[b]Incompatibility[/b]

None, if using a legal copy of Skyrim and updated to the latest version.

[b]Known Issues[/b]

If you are limited in vram and running a lot of 2K texture mods, this mod may cause black face in some circumstances.

[b]Recommended for Immersion[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35785]Destroy Dark Brotherhood Adventure RolePlay Major Revision by Sirropoo[/url]

[b]Used in screenshots:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul by The Realistic Lighting Team[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting - Audio by JJC71[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors by hothtrooper44[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29411]TERA Armor Collection - CBBE - standalone by Frigus[/url]

Feel free to post your images but remember no nudity or coarse language. Keep it clean.
